urls.title: Hand baggage allowances on board of KLM flights - KLM Netherlands
urls.description: Make sure you can bring your carry-on luggage with you on board your KLM flight by checking the maximum dimensions, weight and size for your cabin baggage. - KLM Netherlands

data.text: @liamdennehy Due to the available space and the amount of hand baggage on board, my colleagues at the airport may request that your hand baggage will be transported in hold. You can find more information about this on the website: https://t.co/kybHnl9Trh.
